title: IC3 : total damage caused by reported cyber crime 2001 to 2018
yAxis: Total damage in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Total damage in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The line drastically increased by 2.1 times from Year 2008 to 2009.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Total damage in million U.S. dollars, of value 1450.7 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Total damage in million U.S. dollars, of value 183.1 was reported at Year 2005
min_summary: Overall Total damage in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
